divs: sighting detailsmurrysville: first ufo at 8:23 pm. looked like two pyramids put together, flew over trees at north end of yard as viewed from deck. decided to chase it as it was going pretty slow. as i went to car to put tripod\cam in, saw another one followed by large white orb (similar to one over hot tub on sept 1st). ran to back yard and filmed both as they went same path heading easterly direction up road (rather shaky, i might add). as i went up road saw to my left another one heading the same direction. pulled in to gravel road by new development on haymaker farm road and filmed it flying low and silent towards franklin estates (it flew over houses). figured they were coming from thick woods that would be visible from farm land across from my house which has high observation point. didn't even get to top of hill and saw good sized orange orb hovering over woods at edge of where i filmed the plasma ball one that turned into a fake aircraft. filmed it and it remained an orb... then it dimmed and flickered\blinked then went out. i see this blinking all the time before the "fake planes" in the sky (and nick-named them 'blinkies'). they precede the "fake planes\helicopters because they are them. look for random white strobe-like flashes in the sky around dusk and later. drove to top of farm field and saw what i thought would be another one in the approximately east direction, low over trees. filmed it as it traveled approx. west. went below treeline and then saw another one heading the same way. filmed it. upon zooming in, saw it to appear to be a flaming orb like so many have reported. it traveled pretty slowly towards the west also. went low enough to go below treeline (i'm at top of hill with thin line of trees lining field). i opened car door and stood in door well with foot in open window to get better shot. the most amazing thing is that, upon blow up of the stills grabbed from video, is that they weren't really flames, they seem to be it in the process of morphing (see attached 2 pics)! as evidenced by the video catching it transforming and morphing into what would appear to most people as a helicopter! it was silent this time, but i have footage of other 'weird helicopters' that did make a sound, looked really strange, and the sound seemed 'too harmonic' for a regular man-made one. now that i have visual proof of the morphing, perhaps you'll want to see those too. i find it incredible that no investigator has ever been here! maybe they are sending a 'mind block' to keep you guys away. i don't know... i do know they are visiting here regularly enough for me to film them here and north of downtown pittsburgh. and, if people would just spend their evenings looking at the sky instead of being inside, they would probably see them too (of course, they might appear as aircraft by that time, though). proven by the 'rash' of orange ufos on 4th of july & sightings mostly by smokers and people with dogs. attached is a video of another one at 10:07 pm on same night that didn't make it into part 1 and part 2 of my youtube videos (because there's a 10 minute limit). here's the addresses of the videos: ufo invasion part 1: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=a4emu44h1qs ufo invasion part 2: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=dmkfniby8ja there were so many that night, i'd estimate at least 15-20 during the whole evening. one even 'buzzed' me again in the hot tub at 11:43 pm (attracted to the bubbling water?)! don't worry... they seem to be harmless & peaceful. i hope they introduce themselves soon... i wanna meet them.
Summary: Murrysville: Multiple types & Flaming Orb turns into Fake Helicopter
